TextView.android:text: D.Y.Patil Pratishthan Educational complex, Akurdi is in proximity to Pimpri Chinchwad Industrial belt, IT Park of Hinjewadi and Automobile hub of Talegaon. The Pratishthan is spread over 29 acres of land at Akurdi, which is in the vicinity of Akurdi Railway station and Mumbai - Pune Express highway. The Pratishthan is introducing new engineering college “Dr. D. Y. Patil Institute of Engineering, Management and research”(DYPIEMR) from the Academic Year 2012-13. DYPIEMR offers Bachelor of Engineering course in Mechanical engineering, Computer Engineering, Electronics and Telecommunication, Civil engineering and Chemical Engineering. To enhance the teaching learning process all class rooms are connected with Over Head Projector facility.
